sense.gloss: to float, to be suspended
to rise to the surface, to appear, to emerge, to show up, to loom (up)
to come to mind, to have inspiration
extramarital sex, affair, fooling around
infidelity, wantonness, unfaithfulness, inconstancy, fickleness, caprice
surfacing, rising to the surface
emerging, leaping into prominence
rising (of rank)
relief, embossed carving
bringing to the fore, throwing something into relief
floating, drifting, suspension
wandering (about)
to be reminded of, to call to mind
floating, buoyancy
fishing float, bobber
buoy
lifebuoy, life belt, float, rubber ring
to rise to the surface
to come to the front, to emerge (e.g. from obscurity)
to stand out (e.g. against a dark background)
to float
to become merry, to be cheerful
to become loose, to become unsteady
to feel out of it, to be cut off (e.g. from those around you), to feel out of place
to be frivolous, to be uncertain
to have (time, money, etc.) left over, to be saved (e.g. money)
to have no basis, to be unreliable
ukiyo-e, ukiyoe, Edo-period woodblock print

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑浮↑↓う↓き↑足立↑↓あしだ↓っているね。
↑空↑↓そら↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かぶ↑雲↑↓くも↓が↑美↑↓うつく↓しい。
sdata.e: The clouds floating in the sky are beautiful.

sdata.j: ↑気球↑↓ききゅう↓が↑空↑↓そら↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かんでいた。
sdata.e: A balloon was floating in the air.

sdata.j: ↑奇抜↑↓きばつ↓な↑考↑↓かんが↓えがふと↑心↑↓こころ↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かんだ。
sdata.e: A novel idea occurred to me.

sdata.j: ↑喜色↑↓きしょく↓↑満面↑↓まんめん↓の↑笑↑↓え↓みを↑浮↑↓う↓かべているけど、↑彼↑↓かれ↓、よっぽど↑嬉↑↓うれ↓しいことがあったんだろうな。
sdata.e: You could tell by the ear-to-ear grin that came to his face that he really had something to smile about.

sdata.j: ↑感謝↑↓かんしゃ↓の↑気持↑↓きも↓ちを↑表↑↓あらわ↓す↑適当↑↓てきとう↓な↑言葉↑↓ことば↓が↑思↑↓おも↓い↑浮↑↓う↓かびません。
sdata.e: I can't think of the right words with which to express my thanks.

sdata.j: ↑刈↑↓か↓られた↑草↑↓くさ↓の↑匂↑↓にお↓いは↑暑↑↓あつ↓い↑夏↑↓なつ↓の↑午後↑↓ごご↓のイメージを↑想↑↓おも↓い↑浮↑↓う↓かばせる。
sdata.e: The smell of cut grass summons up images of hot summer afternoons.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓のころの↑事↑↓こと↓が↑頭↑↓あたま↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かんでくる。
sdata.e: Memories of my college days come to my mind.

sdata.j: ↑怪物↑↓かいぶつ↓は↑残酷↑↓ざんこく↓な↑微笑↑↓ほほえ↓みを↑浮↑↓う↓かべた。
↑花↑↓はな↓びらが↑水面↑↓みなも↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かんでいる。
sdata.e: The petals are floating on the water.
